lead_paragraph: Former captain Ricky Ponting has become the third ex-international to take on an interim coaching role with the Australian Twenty20 team next month.
snippet: Former captain Ricky Ponting has become the third ex-international to take on an interim coaching role with the Australian Twenty20 team next month....

headline.main: Former Captain Ponting Joins Australia's Interim Coaching Team
headline.print_headline: Former Captain Ponting Joins Australia's Interim Coaching Team
